title: Hungry Horace  for Commodore 64
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette and cover in a plastic cassette case.
brief_description: Hungry Horace [computer game]. Hungry Horace is a top down single player arcade game similar to Pac Man. Players control Horace through a maze collecting flowers and guards lunches while avoiding capture by the park guards. Horace can ring alarms and frighten guards from the park. If Horace is caught three times, he is thrown out of the park and the game ends.
